workflow_templates.name: Product Requirements Document (PRD)
workflow_templates.purpose: Capture functional and non-functional requirements for a new solution or feature.
workflow_templates.when_to_use: Any time a new EVA feature, RAG solution, or AI-assisted tool is being proposed or refined.
style_notes: Use clear headings and numbered sections.
Include both narrative and bullet lists.
Prefer plain language with occasional technical detail where needed.

workflow_templates.name: AI Software Proposal Self-Assessment
workflow_templates.purpose: Evaluate new AI-related software or tools for alignment with policy, risk appetite, and EVA strategy.
workflow_templates.when_to_use: Any time a vendor or internal team proposes adopting a new AI or web tool.

workflow_templates.name: EVA Work Plan Item
workflow_templates.purpose: Describe and track a specific work item in the EVA Work Plan.
fields: Status (Not started / In progress / Blocked / Complete)

workflow_templates.name: RACI Matrix
workflow_templates.purpose: Clarify who is Responsible, Accountable, Consulted, and Informed for key activities.
workflow_templates.when_to_use: For major projects like EVA DA 2.0, Jurisprudence integration, AssistMe migration.
notes: Avoid too many Rs or Cs on a single line; optimize for clarity.

workflow_templates.name: RAID / RAIDE Log
workflow_templates.purpose: Track Risks, Assumptions, Issues, Dependencies, and (optionally) Decisions.
